title: rvu-file-guide
text: Use following formula calculation customary charge conversion factor: $$ CF = \ CHG = \ SVC = \ 1-n = \ RVU = \ $$  $$ CF = $$ Compute Customary Charge Conversion Factor physician following charge history:  Method: procedure, divide customary charge relative value multiply result frequency procedure physician‚Äôs charge history. Add results computations. Divide result sum frequencies.  determine physician‚Äôs customary charge particular procedure reliable statistical basis, multiply relative value procedure physician‚Äôs customary charge conversion factor appropriate category service (e.g., radiology, medicine, surgery).
code: ex <- dplyr::tibble(   Procedure = 1:5,   `Customary Charge` = c(5, 12, 35, 20, 8),   `Relative Value` = c(1, 2, 4, 3, 1.5),   Frequency = c(3, 7, 5, 4, 6), )  ex |>    gt::gt() |>    gt::opt_table_font(gt::google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |>    gt::tab_header(title = "Physician Charge History") ex <- ex |>    dplyr::mutate(step = (`Customary Charge` / `Relative Value`) * Frequency)    ex |>    gt::gt() |>    gt::opt_table_font(gt::google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |>    gt::tab_header(title = "Physician Charge History") ex |>    dplyr::summarise(`Conversion Factor` = sum(step) / sum(Frequency)) |>    gt::gt() |>    gt::opt_table_font(gt::google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |>    gt::tab_header(title = "Physician Charge History")

title: rvu-file-guide
text: prevailing charge conversion factors used appropriate relative value scale developed formula used customary charge conversion factors, except : CHG: fully adjusted locality prevailing charge procedure locality specialty group specialties (regardless source data locality prevailing charge developed). SVC: number times procedure performed physicians specialty group specialties locality. 1-n: different procedures within category service prevailing charges established specialty group specialties locality. conversion factors calculated fee screen year reflect customary prevailing charges calculated basis charge data year ending June 30 immediately preceding start fee screen year. Also, reasonable charge screens established use relative value scale conversion factors consist two components. Consequently, conversion factors must recalculated change relative value units assigned procedures (may occur use different updated relative value scale) order assure change(s) unit values violate integrity reasonable charge screens. economic index limitation, rollback provision, Administrative Savings Clause applied directly prevailing charge conversion factors calculated accordance section.

Get PPRRVU File by Year ‚Äî get_pprrvu
code: get_pprrvu(dos = "2024-03-31", hcpcs = "99213", pos = "Non-Facility") #> # A tibble: 1 √ó 13 #>   date_start date_end   hcpcs mod   description     wrvu  prvu  mrvu  trvu    cf #>   <date>     <date>     <chr> <chr> <chr>          <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1 2024-01-01 2024-03-31 99213 NA    Office o/p es‚Ä¶   1.3  1.33   0.1  2.73  33.3 #> # ‚Ñπ 3 more variables: pctc <chr>, glob <chr>, mult <chr> get_pprrvu(dos = "2024-02-28", hcpcs = "99213", pos = "Facility") #> # A tibble: 1 √ó 13 #>   date_start date_end   hcpcs mod   description     wrvu  prvu  mrvu  trvu    cf #>   <date>     <date>     <chr> <chr> <chr>          <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1 2024-01-01 2024-03-31 99213 NA    Office o/p es‚Ä¶   1.3  0.56   0.1  1.96  33.3 #> # ‚Ñπ 3 more variables: pctc <chr>, glob <chr>, mult <chr>

title: Parallelized get_pprrvu() ‚Äî get_pprrvu_
text: df <tibble> containing dos, hcpcs, pos ... Pass arguments get_pprrvu().

title: Get RVU Source File ‚Äî get_source
text: year <int> year rvu source file; default 2020 source <chr> rvu source file (pprvu, oppscap, gpci, locco, anes)

arkrvu 0.0.1.9001
text: update standalone-helpers updated rvu_link_table code reformatting changed pkgname rbrvs arkrvu (2024-12-03) get_pprrvu_() using future/furrr get_conversion_factor() refactored data: processed 2024 PPRVU files

title: arkrvu 0.0.0.9001
text: Added article, guide RVU file format.

title: arkrvu 0.0.0.9000
text: Initial commit. Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Pinned test RVU file dataset.
